          ? _c("div", [

                                                ),

                                            ),

                                              "b-col",
                                              [

                                                  attrs: {
                                                    precision:
                                                      Math.round(
                                                        product.rating
                                                      ) == product.rating
                                                        ? 0
                                                        : 1,

                                                    "show-value": "",
                                                    "show-value-max": "",

                                                    variant: "primary",

                                                }),

                                                    addedButtonTitle:

                                                    title: product.title,
                                                    amount: Number(
                                                      product.amount
                                                    ),
                                                    sales: product.sales,

                                                }),
